scenario.name: PSTN Voice Agent Load
scenario.send: INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:+15551230000@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:+15551230000@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:+15551230000@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]>;tag=[peer_tag] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:+15551230000@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:+15551230000@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]>;tag=[peer_tag] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
